Characteristic.name: User Control Point
Characteristic.InformativeText: This definition is shown in the User Data Service Section 3.4 and its subsections.

Enumeration.description: Initiates the procedure to register a new user. The Consent Code for that user is sent as parameter to this op

Initiate the procedure to allow a Client to access the user data stored in the Server (i.e. the user gives consent). The User Index and the Consent Code are sent as parameters to this op code. The response to this control point is Op Code 0x20 followed by the appropriate Response Value.
Deletes the user data of the current user as well as its Consent Code. The response to this control point is Op Code 0x20 followed by the appropriate Response Value.

Characteristic.Note: The original file only included the informative text section. The value section was added for compatibility with the Bluetooth designer plug-in.
